directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray 8x8-inch casserole dish with cooking oil.
Prepare Macaroni & Cheese according to package directions. Stir in cream cheese and Cheddar cheese. Add broccoli. Pour mixture into prepared baking dish.
Combine panko and bacon crumbles; sprinkle over the mac & cheese.
Bake until topping is golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) box Horizon® ClassicMac™ Macaroni & Mild Cheddar Cheese
1/4 cup Horizon® Organic reduced fat milk
1/2 cup Horizon® Organic Shreds shredded Cheddar cheese
title: Baked Bacon Macaroni and Cheese Casserole
